items.title: Nifty Ends Near 25,000 On GST Reforms Buzz; Retail Sentiment Remains ‘Neutral’
items.description: Auto and consumer counters led the rally, while selective pharma and IT stocks lagged.

items.title: Firefly Conducts Feasibility Study To Launch Alpha Rocket From Japan
items.description: If the plan ultimately results in a launch, it would allow Firefly to market itself more aggressively to Asian satellite companies.

items.title: Just Dial Shares: Technicals Weak, But SEBI Analyst Eyes Bounce-Back Triggers From Reliance Integration
items.description: Stock has fallen 6% in a month and remains in a downtrend, with analysts flagging short-term weakness unless it sustains above ₹850.

items.title: Marksans Pharma Rises On Approval To Market Diabetes Drug In The UK
items.description: Unit Relonchem received marketing authorization for three Metformin Hydrochloride Relonchem Prolonged Release Tablets

items.title: Amazon Appstore On Android To Shut Down This Week: Here's What You Need To Know
items.description: The store will remain operational on Fire TV and Fire Tablet devices.
